EmailTemplate.description: [AU] Contract Voided Email notification to all AU Coupon Sellers
EmailTemplate.name: Contract_Voided_Coupon_AU
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Coupon_Seller__c.Coupon_ID__c} has now expired
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Coupon_Seller__c.Seller__c},
The due date to respond the {!Coupon_Seller__c.Coupon_ID__c} has now expired. You will no longer be able to participate in the above campaign.
For Questions, please reach out to your account manager or retailpromotions@ebay.com.
Thank You Retail Promotions Team eBay Australia
